other_tests.findings: Small and rapidly recruiting motor unit potentials associated with fibrillation potentials in deltoid, biceps, iliopsoas, and gastrocnemius; no myotonic discharges.
Chronic noninflammatory myopathy originally reported; later review showed a few muscle fibers harboring characteristic features of MFM.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initial report was chronic noninflammatory myopathy; review indicated features consistent with MFM.

other_tests.findings: Normal sinus rhythm suggesting left atrial enlargement.
Mildly slow conduction velocities with normal amplitudes and distal latencies.
